home.title: Welcome to Guilherme's Portfolio
home.subtitle: Innovating the Future Through Technology and Creativity

bio.title: Who I Am
bio.content: I am Guilherme, a Data Scientist and Data Engineer who finds fulfillment in turning data into meaningful impact. Armed with a Bachelors in Economics, a Masters in Geospatial Technologies, and over six years in the data IT field, I build solutions that combine analytics and innovation.

items.title: Scalable Data Pipelines
items.description: Designing and implementing robust ETL pipelines to process large-scale, time-series data efficiently.

items.title: Machine Learning for Impact
items.description: Applying advanced machine learning techniques to uncover predictive insights and optimize decision-making.

items.title: Geospatial Data Insights
items.description: Leveraging spatial data analysis to create actionable solutions for urban planning and environmental challenges.

cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.content: With a robust background in computer science and years of experience in software development, my CV highlights my academic credentials, professional roles, and technical expertise. I've led teams in building scalable applications and have a proven track record in delivering impactful solutions.

items.description: Development of data pipelines that ensure data quality and availability, consultancy for external clients, and AI experimentation.
Cloud and Data consultancy, with Azure, GCP, Terraform, Python, and Bash, mostly.

items.role: Census Angent of Adminstration and Informatics
items.company: IBGE - Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics
items.description: Field research for the 2022 Brazilian Census. Management of human resources and training of new Field Census Agents. Allocation of equipment and materials to the field agents.
Development of pipelines for time series forecasting, with Bash, Python, R, and Azure.
Data Science consultancy in various projects, using R, Python, Docker, JS, CSS, SQL, Postgres, MongoDB, GCP, AWS, Terraform.

items.name: Merit-based Scholarship for module Thesis
items.description: Awarded for outstanding performance in the Geospatial Technologies program and Thesis module.

items.title: Migration Dynamics in Brazil
items.subtitle:
A Spatial Econometric Analysis
Master's thesis awarded merit-based fellowship in the Erasmus Mundus GeoSpatial Technologies program 2025
R, Python, Terraform, Docker, GCP, BigQuery, DataForm, SQL, SQLX, JS, GWR, MGWR

items.title: Higher Education, Economic Complexity, and Knowledge Spillovers Across Micro-Regions of Brazil
items.subtitle:
A Geographically Weighted Regression Approach
Bachelor thesis for the degree of Economic Sciences
R, Python, GWR

items.title: Export complexity, industrial complexity and regional economic growth in Brazil
items.subtitle:
A comparison of various complexity (ECI) metrics with Brazilian exports and employment data
Python, R, Shiny

items.title: Notes on the Census Microdata
items.subtitle:
Extracting, Transforming, and Loading with Bash, PySpark, and Cloud Storage
Python, PySpark, HDFS, Big Data, Micro Data, Census

items.title: Geographic Normalization
items.subtitle:
What is it and what are its implications?
R, Spatial Statistics, Data Visualization

items.title: Money Neutrality in the Covid19 Era
items.subtitle:
An Animated Analysis with R
Based on economic models, the idea of money neutrality is explained in an animated way. Guilherme rightly predicts inflation in the medium term, as expansionary monetary policies were applied to mitigate the Covid effects. In the long term, 'inflation is nothing but a monetary phenomenon'

items.title: Socioeconomic Observatory of Santa Catarina
items.subtitle:
OSESC
A dashboard to analyze and forecast time series of Brazilian socio-economic data, with focus on the state of Santa Catarina

items.name: Wilhelm, your Artificial Econometrics Professor
items.description: Digital book to teach Econometrics with the support of an AI Agent, Wilhelm, that helps the user take the most from the classes.

items.name: BRvectors
items.description: An R package to get access to Brazilian polygon data at various spatial granularities, as well as some methods for Exploratory Spatial Data Analysis.
items.tech: R, Rstudio, Posit, Brazil, Polygon, IBGE, SHP, GeoParquet

items.name: AzureVM4Nomads
items.description: Terraform automation script for deployment of Azure Virtual Machines at scale.

items.name: How much is this mansion worth?
items.description: Spatial data forecasting to estimate the price of a - supposedly - overpriced house bought by a politician

items.name: Motion Snitcher
items.description: Bash and Python code for a Raspberry Pi send messages when a motion is detected.

items.name: Equanimy Systems
items.description: An AI system to efficiently and equitably allocate resources in a group.

virtual_guigo.title: Virtual Guigo
virtual_guigo.description: A personalized AI assistant embodying Guilherme's expertise in data science and geospatial analysis, offering tailored insights and guidance.
virtual_guigo.example: How would Guilherme approach a geospatial data project?

gwr_discovery.title: GWR Discovery
gwr_discovery.description: A specialized tool for exploring Geographically Weighted Regression models (GWR, MixedGWR, MultiscaleGWR), enabling researchers to compare and analyze spatial regression techniques.
gwr_discovery.example: Compare GWR and MultiscaleGWR for spatial data analysis.

ms_thesis_discovery.title: Thesis Discovery
ms_thesis_discovery.description: A search engine to streamline research on migration driven by economic opportunities, organizing academic resources for Guilherme's master's thesis.
ms_thesis_discovery.example: How does the concept of Sublime Object of Ideology, by Slavoj Zizek, relate to migration?

discovery1.title: Virtual Guigo Discovery Engine
discovery1.description: A Gemini Discovery Engine that embodies Guilherme's expertise in data science and geospatial analysis, offering tailored insights and guidance.

discovery2.description: Details about an interesting topic in the second Discovery.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm Guilherme, a data scientist and geospatial analyst passionate about uncovering insights through data. Based somewhere on Earth, I specialize in econometrics, spatial regression, and AI-driven solutions. I'm open to freelance projects, collaborations, or just a chat about tech!

home.title: Bienvenido a mi Portafolio Profesional
home.subtitle: Innovando el Futuro con Tecnología y Creatividad

bio.title: Quién Soy
bio.content: Soy un ingeniero de software dedicado y entusiasta de la tecnología, apasionado por resolver problemas complejos. Con experiencia en IA, desarrollo web y tecnología sostenible, busco crear soluciones impactantes que impulsen el progreso.

items.title: Análisis Potenciado por IA
items.description: Desarrollé una plataforma de análisis en tiempo real usando aprendizaje automático para optimizar decisiones empresariales.

items.title: App Móvil Multiplataforma
items.description: Construí una aplicación móvil escalable para iOS y Android, mejorando la interacción con los usuarios.

items.title: Defensor de Tecnología Sostenible
items.description: Contribuí a prácticas de codificación energéticamente eficientes para soluciones tecnológicas más verdes.

cv.title: Currículum Vitae
cv.content: Con una sólida formación en informática y años de experiencia en desarrollo de software, mi CV destaca mis credenciales académicas, roles profesionales y experiencia técnica. He liderado equipos en la construcción de aplicaciones escalables y tengo un historial probado en la entrega de soluciones impactantes.

publications.title: Publicaciones
publications.content: Mis contribuciones de investigación abarcan inteligencia artificial, ciencia de datos e ingeniería de software. Publicado en revistas y conferencias de primer nivel, mi trabajo se centra en avanzar en algoritmos de aprendizaje automático y sus aplicaciones en el mundo real.

projects.title: Proyectos
projects.content: Desde contribuciones de código abierto hasta soluciones empresariales, mis proyectos demuestran mi capacidad para enfrentar desafíos complejos. Destacan una plataforma de análisis en tiempo real, un modelo de aprendizaje automático para mantenimiento predictivo y una aplicación móvil multiplataforma.

geolayers.title: GeoLayers
geolayers.content: Curiosity drives my exploration of emerging technologies and ideas. This section captures my experiments with quantum computing, blockchain, and sustainable tech. Join me in uncovering the potential of tomorrow's innovations through prototypes and thought experiments.

discovery.title: Descubrimiento
discovery.content: La curiosidad impulsa mi exploración de tecnologías e ideas emergentes. Esta sección captura mis experimentos con computación cuántica, blockchain y tecnología sostenible. Únete a mí para descubrir el potencial de las innovaciones del mañana.

blog.title: Mi Blog
blog.content: Bienvenido a mi blog, donde comparto ideas, tutoriales y actualizaciones sobre tecnología e innovación. Desde análisis profundos sobre tendencias en IA hasta consejos prácticos de programación, mis publicaciones buscan informar e inspirar.

about.title: Sobre Mí
about.content: Soy un entusiasta de la tecnología con amor por resolver problemas y colaborar. Además de programar, disfruto mentorizando a desarrolladores emergentes, contribuyendo a comunidades tecnológicas y explorando la naturaleza. Conoce más sobre mis valores y visión.

home.title: Bem-vindo ao Meu Portfólio Profissional
home.subtitle: Inovando o Futuro com Tecnologia e Criatividade

bio.title: Quem Sou
bio.content: Sou um engenheiro de software dedicado e entusiasta da tecnologia, apaixonado por resolver problemas complexos. Com experiência em IA, desenvolvimento web e tecnologia sustentável, busco criar soluções impactantes que promovam o progresso.

items.title: Análise Alimentada por IA
items.description: Desenvolvi uma plataforma de análise em tempo real usando aprendizado de máquina para otimizar decisões de negócios.

items.title: Defensor de Tecnologia Sustentável
items.description: Contribuí para práticas de codificação energeticamente eficientes para soluções tecnológicas mais verdes.

cv.title: Currículo
cv.content: Com uma sólida formação em ciência da computação e anos de experiência em desenvolvimento de software, meu currículo destaca minhas credenciais acadêmicas, papéis profissionais e expertise técnica. Liderei equipes na construção de aplicações escaláveis e tenho um histórico comprovado em entregar soluções impactantes.

publications.title: Publicações
publications.content: Minhas contribuições de pesquisa abrangem inteligência artificial, ciência de dados e engenharia de software. Publicado em revistas e conferências de alto nível, meu trabalho foca em avançar algoritmos de aprendizado de máquina e suas aplicações no mundo real.

projects.title: Projetos
projects.content: De contribuições de código aberto a soluções empresariais, meus projetos demonstram minha capacidade de enfrentar desafios complexos. Destaques incluem uma plataforma de análise em tempo real, um modelo de aprendizado de máquina para manutenção preditiva e um aplicativo móvel multiplataforma.

geolayers.title: GeoLayers
geolayers.content: Curiosity drives my exploration of emerging technologies and ideas. This section captures my experiments with quantum computing, blockchain, and sustainable tech. Join me in uncovering the potential of tomorrow's innovations through prototypes and thought experiments.

discovery.title: Descoberta
discovery.content: A curiosidade impulsiona minha exploração de tecnologias e ideias emergentes. Esta seção captura meus experimentos com computação quântica, blockchain e tecnologia sustentável. Junte-se a mim para desvendar o potencial das inovações de amanhã.

blog.title: Meu Blog
blog.content: Bem-vindo ao meu blog, onde compartilho insights, tutoriais e atualizações sobre tecnologia e inovação. De análises profundas sobre tendências em IA a dicas práticas de programação, meus posts buscam informar e inspirar.

about.title: Sobre Mim
about.content: Sou um entusiasta da tecnologia com paixão por resolver problemas e colaborar. Além de programar, gosto de orientar desenvolvedores iniciantes, contribuir para comunidades tecnológicas e explorar a natureza. Saiba mais sobre meus valores e visão.

home.title: Willkommen zu meinem professionellen Portfolio
home.subtitle: Die Zukunft durch Technologie und Kreativität gestalten

bio.title: Wer ich bin
bio.content: Ich bin ein engagierter Softwareingenieur und Technikbegeisterter mit einer Leidenschaft für die Lösung komplexer Probleme. Mit Expertise in KI, Webentwicklung und nachhaltiger Technologie strebe ich danach, wirkungsvolle Lösungen zu schaffen, die Fortschritt fördern.

items.title: KI-gestützte Analysen
items.description: Entwickelte eine Echtzeit-Analyseplattform mit maschinellem Lernen zur Optimierung von Geschäftsentscheidungen.

items.title: Plattformübergreifende Mobile App
items.description: Erstellte eine skalierbare mobile App für iOS und Android, die das Nutzerengagement steigert.

items.title: Befürworter nachhaltiger Technologie
items.description: Trug zu energieeffizienten Programmierpraktiken für umweltfreundlichere Technologielösungen bei.

cv.title: Lebenslauf
cv.content: Mit einem fundierten Hintergrund in Informatik und jahrelanger Erfahrung in der Softwareentwicklung hebt mein Lebenslauf meine akademischen Qualifikationen, beruflichen Rollen und technischen Fähigkeiten hervor. Ich habe Teams beim Aufbau skalierbarer Anwendungen geleitet und eine nachweisbare Erfolgsbilanz bei der Lieferung wirkungsvoller Lösungen.

publications.title: Publikationen
publications.content: Meine Forschungsergebnisse umfassen Künstliche Intelligenz, Datenwissenschaft und Softwaretechnik. Veröffentlicht in erstklassigen Fachzeitschriften und Konferenzen, konzentriert sich meine Arbeit auf die Weiterentwicklung von Machine-Learning-Algorithmen und deren praktische Anwendungen.

projects.title: Projekte
projects.content: Von Open-Source-Beiträgen bis hin zu Unternehmenslösungen zeigen meine Projekte meine Fähigkeit, komplexe Herausforderungen zu meistern. Zu den Highlights gehören eine Echtzeit-Analyseplattform, ein Machine-Learning-Modell für vorausschauende Wartung und eine plattformübergreifende mobile App.

geolayers.title: GeoLayers
geolayers.content: Curiosity drives my exploration of emerging technologies and ideas. This section captures my experiments with quantum computing, blockchain, and sustainable tech. Join me in uncovering the potential of tomorrow's innovations through prototypes and thought experiments.

discovery.title: Entdeckung
discovery.content: Neugier treibt meine Erforschung neuer Technologien und Ideen an. Dieser Abschnitt zeigt meine Experimente mit Quantencomputing, Blockchain und nachhaltiger Technologie. Begleiten Sie mich, um das Potenzial der Innovationen von morgen zu entdecken.

blog.title: Mein Blog
blog.content: Willkommen in meinem Blog, wo ich Einblicke, Tutorials und Updates zu Technologie und Innovation teile. Von tiefgehenden Analysen zu KI-Trends bis hin zu praktischen Programmiertipps sollen meine Beiträge informieren und inspirieren.

about.title: Über Mich
about.content: Ich bin ein Technikbegeisterter mit einer Leidenschaft für Problemlösung und Zusammenarbeit. Neben dem Programmieren genieße ich es, angehende Entwickler zu betreuen, mich in Technik-Communities zu engagieren und die Natur zu erkunden. Erfahren Sie mehr über meine Werte und Vision.

home.title: Bienvenue sur mon portfolio professionnel
home.subtitle: Innover l'avenir grâce à la technologie et à la créativité

bio.title: Qui suis-je
bio.content: Je suis un ingénieur logiciel dévoué et passionné par la technologie, avec un amour pour résoudre des problèmes complexes. Avec une expertise en IA, développement web et technologies durables, je m'efforce de créer des solutions impactantes qui favorisent le progrès.

items.title: Analytique alimentée par l'IA
items.description: Développé une plateforme d'analyse en temps réel utilisant l'apprentissage automatique pour optimiser les décisions commerciales.

items.title: Application mobile multiplateforme
items.description: Créé une application mobile évolutive pour iOS et Android, améliorant l'engagement des utilisateurs.

items.title: Défenseur des technologies durables
items.description: Contribué à des pratiques de codage écoénergétiques pour des solutions technologiques plus vertes.

cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.content: Avec une solide formation en informatique et des années d'expérience en développement logiciel, mon CV met en avant mes qualifications académiques, mes rôles professionnels et mon expertise technique. J'ai dirigé des équipes dans la création d'applications évolutives et j'ai fait mes preuves en livrant des solutions impactantes.

publications.title: Publications
publications.content: Mes contributions à la recherche couvrent l'intelligence artificielle, la science des données et l'ingénierie logicielle. Publié dans des revues et conférences de premier plan, mon travail se concentre sur l'avancement des algorithmes d'apprentissage automatique et leurs applications pratiques.

projects.title: Projets
projects.content: Des contributions open-source aux solutions d'entreprise, mes projets démontrent ma capacité à relever des défis complexes. Parmi les points forts, une plateforme d'analyse en temps réel, un modèle d'apprentissage automatique pour la maintenance prédictive et une application mobile multiplateforme.

discovery.title: Découverte
discovery.content: La curiosité guide mon exploration des technologies et idées émergentes. Cette section présente mes expérimentations avec l'informatique quantique, la blockchain et les technologies durables. Rejoignez-moi pour découvrir le potentiel des innovations de demain.

geolayers.title: GeoLayers
geolayers.content: Curiosity drives my exploration of emerging technologies and ideas. This section captures my experiments with quantum computing, blockchain, and sustainable tech. Join me in uncovering the potential of tomorrow's innovations through prototypes and thought experiments.

blog.title: Mon Blog
blog.content: Bienvenue sur mon blog, où je partage des idées, des tutoriels et des mises à jour sur la technologie et l'innovation. Des analyses approfondies sur les tendances de l'IA aux conseils pratiques de programmation, mes articles visent à informer et inspirer.

about.title: À propos de moi
about.content: Je suis un passionné de technologie avec un amour pour la résolution de problèmes et la collaboration. En dehors du codage, j'apprécie encadrer les développeurs en herbe, contribuer aux communautés technologiques et explorer la nature. Découvrez mes valeurs et ma vision.

home.title: 欢迎体验我的专业作品集
home.subtitle: 通过技术和创意创新未来

bio.title: 我是谁
bio.content: 我是一名专注的软件工程师和技术爱好者，热衷于解决复杂问题。凭借在人工智能、Web开发和可持续技术方面的专长，我致力于创造推动进步的具有影响力的解决方案。

items.title: 人工智能驱动的分析
items.description: 开发了一个使用机器学习优化商业决策的实时分析平台。

items.title: 跨平台移动应用
items.description: 构建了一个可扩展的移动应用，适用于iOS和Android，提升用户参与度。

items.title: 可持续技术倡导者
items.description: 为更环保的技术解决方案贡献了节能编码实践。

cv.title: 简历
cv.content: 凭借计算机科学的扎实背景和多年的软件开发经验，我的简历突显了我的学术资质、职业角色和技术专长。我曾领导团队开发可扩展的应用，并在交付具有影响力的解决方案方面有着良好的记录。

publications.title: 出版物
publications.content: 我的研究贡献涵盖人工智能、数据科学和软件工程。我在顶级期刊和会议上发表了论文，研究重点是推进机器学习算法及其现实世界的应用。浏览我的论文以了解更多研究成果。

projects.title: 项目
projects.content: 从开源贡献到企业解决方案，我的项目展示了应对复杂挑战的能力。亮点包括一个实时分析平台、一个用于预测性维护的机器学习模型和一个跨平台移动应用。深入了解详情，感受我的工作成果。

geolayers.title: GeoLayers
geolayers.content: Curiosity drives my exploration of emerging technologies and ideas. This section captures my experiments with quantum computing, blockchain, and sustainable tech. Join me in uncovering the potential of tomorrow's innovations through prototypes and thought experiments.

discovery.title: 探索
discovery.content: 好奇心驱动我探索新兴技术和理念。本节记录了我对量子计算、区块链和可持续技术的实验。加入我，一起揭开未来创新的潜力，通过原型和思想实验。

blog.title: 我的博客
blog.content: 欢迎访问我的博客，我在这里分享技术与创新的见解、教程和更新。从深入探讨人工智能趋势到实用的编程技巧，我的文章旨在启发和传递知识。查看下面的最新文章。

about.title: 关于我
about.content: 我是一位热爱解决问题的技术爱好者，热衷于协作。除了编程，我喜欢指导有志开发者，参与技术社区，以及探索自然。了解更多关于我的价值观、热情和对技术驱动未来的愿景。
